cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.dao.base

Class DaoImpl<E extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.dao.base.BaseDao
      • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.dao.base.DaoImpl<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - entity type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dao<E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArticleDaoImpl, CodeDaoImpl, CompileInfoDaoImpl, ContestDaoImpl, ContestProblemDaoImpl, ContestTeamDaoImpl, ContestUserDaoImpl, DepartmentDaoImpl, LanguageDaoImpl, MessageDaoImpl, ProblemDaoImpl, ProblemTagDaoImpl, SettingDaoImpl, StatusDaoImpl, TagDaoImpl, TeamDaoImpl, TeamUserDaoImpl, TrainingContestDaoImpl, TrainingDaoImpl, TrainingPlatformInfoDaoImpl, TrainingUserDaoImpl, UserDaoImpl, UserSerialKeyDaoImpl

    @Repository
public abstract class DaoImpl<E extends java.io.Serializable>
extends BaseDao
implements Dao<E>
    Global DAO implementation.

    WARN: This class is only a abstract class, please create subclass by overriding getReference method.
